page.title: 06Village Schools
page.content: The Old School - Mary Deans This school was opened in 1877 after the village outgrew the first school, called Hillside, when schooling became compulsory. The old Mary Deans school is in three sections - the main section(above which the bell was); a middle section and the section beside the Headmaster's house, which was next door. This school building was again outgrown in 1976, and Mary Deans school moved into a new building near the Naval Estate in Tamerton Foliot. The old buildings were converted for residential use. The New School - Tamerton Vale This school was opened in 1971 by our present Prime Minister, Mrs. Thatcher. The school has three playgrounds surrounded by grass,two playing fields and a small swimming pool.
